Package edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.common

Some generic implementations of the Reasoner interface and the interfaces of edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.IF.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommonReasoner
    An implementation of Reasoner based on a given Simplifier and TheoremProverFactory.
    CommonReasonerFactory
    Factory for producing instances of CommonReasoner.
    ContextMinimizingReasoner
    A Reasoner based on context minimization.
    ContextMinimizingReasonerFactory
    A factory for producing instances of ContextMinimizingReasoner.
    SimpleReasoner
    Very basic reasoner that does not use any theorem prover, only simplification.

Package edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.common Description

Some generic implementations of the Reasoner interface and the interfaces of edu.udel.cis.vsl.sarl.reason.IF.
